document.full_text: a bloomberg national poll, in line with other surveys, is instructive: americans consider the widening deficit and debt a big deal, but they reject most of the measures necessary to deal with the threat.
document.title: letter from washington: when it comes to the deficit, resolve is weak
lines_and_colors: a bloomberg national poll, in line with other surveys, is instructive: americans consider the widening deficit and debt a big deal, but they reject most of the measures necessary to deal with the threat.
